entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add public API to obtain a location specifier for a call #72133
    17.10
  • GeneratorDriverState should replace TrackIncrementalSteps/DisabledOutputs fields with properties #72129
  • Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #72124
  • Copy/Paste does not preserve semantics when multiple types with the same name exist #72122
  • Spread Operator with possible null value gives no compile time warning if nullable enabled #72121
  • Nuget for Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset 4.9.0 #72117
  • [C#] Nested curly brace is not auto completed in interpolated string #72116

Closed

  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName could run faster if the tree stored a bit on nodes that contained attributes or not. #72066
  • Add `IParameterSymbol.IsParamCollection` property #71816
  • MsBuildWorkspace throws exception when netcoreapp2.1 app is loaded #71919

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove legacy unit testing type #72132
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Always visit conversions in array initializers #72131
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup handling of flags in internal syntax nodes. #72130
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #72127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fallback to solution options #72126
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support more than one frozen source generated document at once #72115
    Area-IDE
  • Add caching for Regex creation in AnalyzerConfigSet #72114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address more PROTOTYPE comments #72113
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Merged

  • Add dedicated bit for indicating if a node itself has annotations (versus its children). #72104
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Warn when converting to Lock subtype #72119
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Forward the call to global option service #72128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Grab 4 more bits for use as node flags. Use additional bit to store if nodes contain attributes within them. #72070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Rename `Lock.EnterScope` method #72118
    New Feature - Lock Type
  • Add `Lock` type to the compiler test plan #72120
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Remove .NET 7 install step #72100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature to Language Feature Status.md #72125
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Fix NRE in primary constructor XML doc binder #72006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Defer parsing syntax trees when computing frozen partial solutions #72090
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add invariant around nullable conditional state #72072
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.10
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Bump a few transitively included packages to 8.0 #72092
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Reuse compilation tracker states when possible. #72111
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unify handling of constant and not constant chars during string concat #72086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
